title: Raffles Place MRT platform cordoned off due to water leak

title_translations.zh-Hans: Raffles Place MRT 由于漏水而封锁
title_translations.ms: Platform Raffles Place MRT ditutup akibat kebocoran air

updates.text: The post discusses a situation at Raffles Place MRT station where a section of the platform has been cordoned off due to water leaking from the ceiling. It includes an image of the affected area and links to the source and comments on Reddit.
